QuestData.Title: Arelion's Journal
QuestData.Description: My husband, Arelion, had been fascinated with the Pools of Aggonar ever since we arrived in Outland. He spent much of his time studying slimes, of all things!$B$BHe went missing in there a few days ago. They say he's dead and there's nothing I can do about it.$B$BOne thing I can do is try to ensure that his research doesn't die with him. Go northeast to the pools and look for his journal. He always carried it inside a brown knapsack.
QuestData.LogDescription: Magistrix Carinda at Falcon Watch in Hellfire Peninsula wants you to go to the Pools of Aggonar and retrieve Arelion's Journal.
QuestData.CompletionText: Any luck, $N? You'll find the Pools of Aggonar north of Hellfire Citadel.
QuestData.RewardText: My husband's journal... it's not about research at all!$B$BHow could I've been such a fool? "Magical properties of fel-infused slime forms," he really had me going there.
